categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic

nodes.text: Maeve was a female Human citizen of the Eternal Empire living during the Galactic War. A member of the Knights of Zakuul, after the Coronation of Empress Vaylin she went into exile following the disgraced Battalion Commander Tassar. Tassar and her followers made significant progress in constructing a new Star Fortress on Rakata Prime's surface, however following the death of Vaylin in 3630 BBY they were discovered by the Eternal Alliance forces. A strike team was dispatched to stop Tassar and her efforts, which confronted and killed Maeve.
